mapper.select: SELECT POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE ,EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, REGDATE FROM SHPOLL WHERE POLLID=#{pollid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHPOLL (POLLID,ID, QUESTION, SDATE ,EDATE, ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL, REGDATE) VALUES (SEQ_SHPOLL.NEXTVAL, #{id},#{question}, #{wdate},#{edate}, #{itemcount}, 0, SYSDATE)
INSERT INTO SHPOLLSUB (POLLSUBID, POLLID, ANSWER, ACOUNT ) VALUES (SEQ_SHPOLL_SUB.NEXTVAL, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(POLLID),0) FROM SHPOLL) , #{answer}, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT POLLID, ID, QUESTION, SDATE ,EDATE,ITEMCOUNT, POLLTOTAL,REGDATE FROM SHPOLL ORDER BY SDATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHVOTER(VOTERID,POLLID, POLLSUBID, ID,REGDATE) VALUES(SEQ_SH_VOTER.NEXTVAL, #{pollid}, #{pollsubid},#{id}, SYSDATE)
mapper.update: UPDATE SHPOLLSUB SET ACOUNT = ACOUNT+1 WHERE POLLID=#{pollid} AND POLLSUBID=#{pollsubid}
UPDATE SHPOLL SET POLLTOTAL = POLLTOTAL + 1 WHERE POLLID=#{pollid}
